name: ABCD 26
description:
ABCDEFG ALPHABET

Education apps for Kids, 9 different levels of Lowercase-ALPHABET and 9 different levels of UpperCase-ALPHABET, Question Mark is dynamic, with Easy to press a button Question Mark changing,learning ALPHABET and sounds! Preschool ALPHABET
Puzzles.

you can rely on our updates of the various puzzles.

we made considerable effort that this app is as appropriate and easy-to-use for this very special age category as possible. We hope that your children will enjoy it the same way as our enthusiastic beta-testers did.
Simple and easy to use App, allows small kids to engage in learning activity without any parents involvement.
Fast response and easy to pick up and play
Great for all ages

Want some fun for your child? ALPHABET Puzzle for Toddlers is a must-have!

In this app you will get:
• Full alphabet and sound
Touch each letter to hear its name
learn letter with sound
learn letters positions after go to practice in puzzles.


If you have any suggesting on how we could further improve the design, please leave us a message at info@sinatism.com . We always appreciate comments on how to make our apps even better!
ALPHABETlearn, your trusted educational app developer


Requirements :
Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch and iPad. This app is optimized for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad
